Package dataStructures.naive

Class NaiveIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataStructures.Aindexer<NaiveSearch>
      • dataStructures.naive.NaiveIndexer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NaiveIndexerRK
    public class NaiveIndexer
extends Aindexer<NaiveSearch>
    A "naive" indexer. This approach forgoes actually preprocessing the file, and simply loads the text and searches directly on it.
